name: Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Gameboy Edition Test Build
name_original: Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Gameboy Edition Test Build
description:
The Gameboy game based on an anime "Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun (A.K.A. Jibaku Shounen Hanako-Kun)" Still in development. Some assets in game might get replace later. There’s nothing much in the test build, but I will keep adding important stuff!

If you found bugs, problems or suggestions, DM me at @HanakoKun_GB in Twitter, or send me an e-mail at hanakokungameboy@gmail.com

This game use GB Studio Engine
